## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4c591a20fbe6de7639db5ac559fbc7db95960967fb3eb809e6fe2f58943f4a75)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@blocks-shared/atom-panel' @ 1.99.100 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
